snippet: Jeffrey Seller and Kevin McCollum, the producing team behind "Rent," "Avenue Q" and "In the Heights," are amicably ending their professional partnership after 21 years.
abstract: Jeffrey Seller and Kevin McCollum, the producing team behind "Rent," "Avenue Q" and "In the Heights," are amicably ending their professional partnership after 21 years.
lead_paragraph: Kevin McCollum and Jeffrey Seller, the Broadway producing team behind the Tony Award-winning musicals "Rent," "Avenue Q" and "In the Heights," said on Friday that they were ending their 21-year business partnership to produce independently.

headline.main: Producing Partnership Behind 'Rent' and 'Avenue Q' Comes to an End
